entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
